channel.title: How long did OOP take to fully learn?
channel.description:
OK, well I know some people may know I am starting my own server, but I am also learning Java. I read this guide and it told me to learn OOP first so I can get a better understanding of Java, but I wanna know how long it takes. Right now I am reading this page:
http://www.jamesbooth.com/OOPBasics.htm
